name: Jig Tale
description:
You play as a small robot, trapped in an office. The password for the exit is somewhere in the room. 

Controls:
Keyboard and mouse - more instructions in-game. Press ESC while in-game to see more options.

So far there are 3 types of ranged weapons:

Pop Revolver
Pop Assault Rifle
Pop Double Barrel Shotgun

So far there are 2 companions, as well as 2 cars to find. 

Made with Unity 2019 & GKC 3.02g.
More development, sometime soon.

Let us know what you think!
